name: Personalized Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Overlay "Mom" Ring with Birthstone Heart and Diamond Accent

reviews.name: Personalized Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Overlay "Mom" Ring with Birthstone Heart and Diamond Accent
reviews.reviewText: When I saw this ring online,I thought it is the perfect gift for my mother.But when I go the product.. It looked nothing to what my expectations were. With the color online and the color of my mothers birthstone,it looks tottaly different .With every thing. And I think it isn't worth almost $60.00. Not for a fake white diamond that doesn't sparkle.And her birthstone doesn't make the ring look good at all..at least thats what I think.
reviews.title: Pretty online,depeanding on the birthsone u choose

reviews.name: Personalized Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Overlay "Mom" Ring with Birthstone Heart and Diamond Accent
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful ring with birthstone. Perfect mother's day gift for the mom of an only child. I love it...it honestly shows me how much I mean to my son.
reviews.title: Beautiful

reviews.name: Personalized Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Overlay "Mom" Ring with Birthstone Heart and Diamond Accent
reviews.reviewText: i agree that the diamond is much smaller than it appears. Also within less than a month the gold overlay is peeling off.
reviews.title: 03 August 2012

reviews.name: Personalized Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Overlay "Mom" Ring with Birthstone Heart and Diamond Accent
reviews.reviewText: it looks great my only issue with it is that the diamond on the heart is alot smaller then expected but what ever its still a beautiful product.
reviews.title: my mom loved it

reviews.name: Personalized Sterling Silver with 18K Gold Overlay "Mom" Ring with Birthstone Heart and Diamond Accent
reviews.reviewText: my brother and sister in-law got this ring for me for Christmas, when i got it in the mail it with clear nail polish (I do this with all my jewelry just in case) I Love it it's a beautiful ring!!! After receiving the ring I read the reviews posted my others for this ring and I would have to say that it does appear different online and when getting it in the mail yes the heart is a little bigger than expected but honestly what could you expect? I myself love the ring and would recommend it to all of my friends!
reviews.title: LOVE THE RING
